info.text: Human Resource database - is a new software that will change the principle of employee resource accounting. Everything is clear and intuitive which even a user far from this will understand.
info.text2: Human Resource database - is a free product with all the features without any restrictions, we will also consider all of your wishes in fixing and adding new features (even if you use the free version and this does not contradict our policies).
info.title: To customers

main.text: Simple and flexible Employee Management System

p1.text: The “Free” plan includes all the platform features.
p1.title: Free

p2.text: The “Standard” plan includes all the platform features.
p2.title: Standard

p3.text: The “Advanced” plan includes all the platform features.
p3.title: Advanced

slide.0: Easy and flexible configuration, the ability to customize everything
slide.3: Presence log, employee monitoring in one place
